show.title: Double Game
show.description: üíÉüèª Modelling field la success aaganum nu thudikkiraa Kavya, but ava veetla modelling laam venaam kalyaanam pannikko nu solli oru panakkaara maappillaikku kazhutha neeta solraanga, intha nilaila oru naal ava modelling contract visayamaa mumbai ponappo avaloda twin sister kavya va meet panraa.. antha naal la irunthu avaloda life thalaikeelaa maaruthu..
